topic.title: New to ZeroNet, Hi!
topic.body: I'm new to ZeroNet and I'm kinda stumbling around learning about bits and bobs. Hello, notinternet!

1513344544_1NekEfk2dRHtSeioUKrRXKfaiS9A6.body:
> [lethalethan88](#comment_1_19cQViUvBQtwiGpPci2u61jmQm4wVt8L8c): Zeronet will still be here due to being decentralised from the actual internet

Wouldn't ISPs just blanket ban everything and put specific shit that they approve on a whitelist of sorts? I don't know much about how Zeronet works, but wouldn't the protocol we use just be blanket banned by them since it isn't an HTTP request to a domain they've specifically allowed?

1512670011_1Ga7vs5ZV73jbTSMR77FuZi8KWt2M.body: I think you have a little case of what I like to call "I have no idea what I'm talking about".

1513303856_1PdVrw7boKHUavWTQxD3UaNGM4tx5.body: Tbh I never used NoFap, but I can never say I was addicted to fapping. I used to fap a lot but that changed when I joined the FGC and started playing at Skullgirls locals. I found that other interests were taking over my "me time", and I just stopped m'baiting regularly.

1513581532_1PdVrw7boKHUavWTQxD3UaNGM4tx5.body: Mind at least mirroring this shit on a Zeronet site? We aren't going on Zeronet to find HTTP links lol
